item.title: the pie chart
item.description: categories: [“datavis,”“R,”“R:elementary”] date: “2018-08-22T11:23:32+01:00” draft: false header: caption: "" image: “vaccination_pie.png” tags: [“pie chart,”“data,”“circular,”“proportions,”“first post,” “treemap,”“waffle,”“bar”] title: the pie chart bibliography: bibliography.bib lang: en slug: “pie-chart” Welcome to my blog! I am Dominic Royé, researcher and lecturer of physical geography at the University of Santiago de Compostela. One of my passions is R programming to visualize and analyze any type of data.
